mutants.code:
def bitwise_sum(lst):
    total_sum = 1
    carry = 0
    for num in lst:
        total_sum ^= num
        carry |= total_sum & num
        total_sum &= ~carry
        carry <<= 1
    return total_sum

def bitwise_sum(lst):
    total_sum = -1
    carry = 0
    for num in lst:
        total_sum ^= num
        carry |= total_sum & num
        total_sum &= ~carry
        carry <<= 1
    return total_sum

    total_sum = 0
